unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Find the Confidence Interval
question_text: You are given a regression analysis computer output table below for " y y -value versus x x -value." Predictor Coef SE Coef T T P P Constant − 4.231 − 4.231 0.2561 0.2561 5.05 5.05 0.0000 0.0000 x x value 0.5678 0.5678 0.0769 0.0769 6.11 6.11 0.0000 0.0000 Given a sample size of 42 42 , and assuming that all conditions have been verified, find the 95 % 95 % confidence interval for this data.
